# Internet for Investigators Course
### Solicitation Reference: cb-93-49737782
#### Request for Proposal (RFP) - English Language Copy

**Short Description**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a service provider to deliver an Internet for Investigators course to RCMP officers. The course will be approximately five days and 35 hours in length, and will cover topics such as internet investigations, online research, and data analysis.

**Course Objectives**

* Provide instructors with facilitated in-class and virtual instruction, including assessments and feedback on assignments and research projects
* Deliver an estimated ten courses per year with 24 candidates per course
* Ensure the provision of resources and infrastructure necessary for the course

**Contract Requirements**

* Contract duration: three years with option to renew for up to two additional one-year periods
* Start date: July 2024
* Services: instruction and delivery of the Internet for Investigators course

**Selection Criteria**

* Lowest/Lower Bid

**Submissions**

Submissions should be sent to E_Pacific_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. All documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buyers website.

**Trade Agreements**

This contract falls under the terms of the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

**Screening Services**

The Government of Canada's Integrity Regime is in effect for this solicitation. Any issues or conflicts of interest should be reported.

**Miscellaneous**

The Indigenous Business Directory is available online for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous capacity. Companies are encouraged to visit the Canada Buyers website for more information. [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory)


Please note, tenders must be submitted before the deadline. ([2024-04-30T17:00:00](https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=TENDER%20CLOSING+&iso=20240430T170000)) Late submissions will not be accepted.

Aux mots, this tenders is request for proposals, while referring to the attached documentation for additional information. Please do not hesitate to contact us at [alice.weng@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:alice.weng@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) if you need further clarification. We are available to answer
